about.title: About Me
about.intro: Since I was 12 years old, I’ve been passionate about programming, gaining valuable experience as a software developer. In addition to my work as a developer, I am also active as a builder’s assistant. My curiosity and eagerness to learn drive me to understand how things work behind the scenes.
about.more: My desire to keep learning has helped me adapt quickly to new technologies and challenges. Developing software and improving processes is not only my job but also my passion.

help.title: Need Help?
help.intro: Are you a company or an individual looking for assistance with automation, small backend projects, or technical solutions? Feel free to get in touch! I will decide whether to take on the project based on the task and my availability.
help.details: Whether it's simplifying your work processes, automating repetitive tasks, or improving systems, I'm here to help. Don’t hesitate to ask, and who knows, we might collaborate on your project!
